mapper.insert: insert into groups (groupId, title, type, description, headIconUrl, creatorId, createTime, attentionCount, recommend, enable) values (#{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headiconurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatorid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{attentioncount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recommend,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update groups set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, headIconUrl = #{headiconurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creatorId = #{creatorid,jdbcType=CHAR}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, attentionCount = #{attentioncount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, recommend = #{recommend,jdbcType=TINYINT}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=TINYINT} where groupId = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select groupId, title, type, description, headIconUrl, creatorId, createTime, attentionCount, recommend, enable from groups where groupId = #{groupid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select groupId, title, type, description, headIconUrl, creatorId, createTime, attentionCount, recommend, enable from groups
